title: Ep 306: Sam Morril & The New York New Breed
itunes:title: Ep 306: Sam Morril & The New York New Breed
description:
Bobby takes an appetizer poo. Sam loses to a mime named Tape Face. We talk A-Rod's amazing Instagram, Bobby's BTK doppelganger, Dave Attell's pillowcase luggage, Simon Cowell's bad mood, and NY vs LA comics.
